title: Voeville California King Bed
description:
The Voeville collection will create a warmer and transitional environment in your master bedroom with the antique silver finish. Button Tufted/PU panel headboard and beveled shaped face drawers for the nightstand, dresser and chest; English dovetail construction and Felt-Lined top drawers, you can store your jewelry safe; Metal glide can make the drawers easy to open and close. Create a unique and more relaxing look in your bedroom with the Voeville Collection.

title: Andria Eastern King Bed
description:
This collection was created to address a trending style in today's market while adding some transitional feel by bowing the inset drawers. Use of the slats in the center of the drawer and hardware to match the slats creates a uniform design element. Slat look is carried through to the accents on the mirror as well as the beds. The panel bed uses the middle slat look of the cases to have a suited option. Cases and beds are on metal legs to modernize the collection. This collection features Sherwin-Williams finish on Poplar solids and veneers to emphasize the glued up look and accentuate the grain characteristics.

title: Versailles Eastern King Bed
description:
Sleep like royalty with this Versailles Bed Set. The bedroom set was inspired by old European design. The Bed features carved scrollwork accent with nailhead trim Decor and tufted upholstery on both headboard and footboard. The accent pieces crafted in wood with cherry oak veneer finish, and also include regal features such as ample storage, beveled mirror, Felt-Lined drawers, and brown copper finish hardware. The carved details and cherry oak finish give a royal look to your bedroom space with this bed.
